framework_selection.justification: Cross-platform development with native performance, excellent privacy-first local storage options, comprehensive camera and file system APIs
framework_selection.alternative_frameworks: React Native CLI for maximum native control, Flutter for high-performance UI

data_architecture.storage_strategy: Local-first with optional encrypted cloud backup
data_architecture.primary_database: expo-sqlite for local financial data storage
data_architecture.backup_strategy: End-to-end encrypted JSON export with user-controlled cloud storage
data_architecture.data_synchronization: Optional multi-device sync using encrypted data streams

security_architecture.data_encryption: AES-256 encryption for sensitive financial data using expo-secure-store
security_architecture.privacy_compliance: Zero external data sharing, GDPR-compliant data handling
security_architecture.authentication: Guest-first with optional biometric security for app access
security_architecture.backup_security: User-controlled encryption keys for cloud backup data

performance_architecture.state_management: Zustand for lightweight global state with SQLite persistence
performance_architecture.data_optimization: Virtualized lists for large transaction datasets, lazy loading for analytics
performance_architecture.caching_strategy: Intelligent query caching with React Query for database operations
performance_architecture.bundle_optimization: Dynamic imports for non-critical features, tree-shaking optimization

integration_architecture.camera_integration: expo-camera with expo-image-manipulator for receipt processing
integration_architecture.subscription_integration: react-native-purchases with RevenueCat for subscription management
integration_architecture.analytics_integration: Local analytics only - no external tracking services

data_growth_planning.transaction_storage: Efficient indexing for 10,000+ transactions per user
data_growth_planning.envelope_scalability: Support for 100+ envelopes with fast query performance
data_growth_planning.backup_optimization: Incremental backup strategy for large datasets
